amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provides for the consideration of H.R. 5212, "Emergency Supplemental Appropriations for Hurricane Disasters Assistance Act, 2005".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Putnam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Putnam amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
